name: Hacker (itch) (portalmaster2015)
description: Currently trying to fix Password error on Nuke. When you guess the passwords on then type in menu. Then choose a level , type menu again then it will work.  How to play: Choose the theme of the password and then put in passwords that would be part of that theme such as library: Books, Shelf, Borrow, until you guess the password. This is my first game, but I am getting better. This is a simple Hacker game that I did as part of a courses I did. The assets are made by the instructors. I have a discussion board set up if you would like to add suggestions to  this or other games.
